parameters.name: EntityType
parameters.label: Entity Type
parameters.query:
VectraEntityScoring
| where ['Last Updated'] {timerange} 
| summarize arg_max(['Last Updated'],*) by ['Entity ID'], Type
| where ('*' in ({View}) or ["Is Prioritized"] in ({View}))
| extend source = tostring(split(Name,":")[0])
| extend source2 = iff(isempty(source),"NA",source)
| where ('*' in ({DataSource}) or source2 in ({DataSource}))
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Type
| distinct ID, ['Type']
| extend splitted_entity_type = split(['Type'],"_")
| mv-expand splitted_entity_type = splitted_entity_type
| extend cap = toupper(substring(splitted_entity_type,0,1)), rest_string = substring(splitted_entity_type,1)
| extend joined_str = strcat(cap,rest_string)
| distinct joined_str,ID,['Type']
| summarize joined_array = make_list(todynamic(joined_str)) by ID, ['Type']
| extend capitalized_Category = strcat_array(joined_array, " ")
| distinct ['Type'], capitalized_Category

content.query:
VectraEntityScoring
| where ['Last Updated'] {timerange}
| summarize arg_max(['Last Updated'],*) by ['Entity ID'], Type
| where ('*' in ({View}) or ["Is Prioritized"] in ({View})) and ('*' in ({EntityType}) or Type in ({EntityType}))
| extend ['Data Source Type'] = case(Name startswith "AWS", "AWS", 
                                        Name startswith "SAML", "AWS",
                                        Name startswith "O365", "M365/AAD",
                                        Name startswith "M365", "M365/AAD",
                                        Name startswith "Azure", "M365/AAD","Network")
| where ('*' in ({DataSource}) or ['Data Source Type'] in ({DataSource}))
| extend priority = case(
    ['Is Prioritized'] == true, "Prioritized",
    ['Is Prioritized'] == false, "Not Prioritized",
    "Unknown"
)
| summarize count() by priority
| order by priority desc
content.title: Entity Count by Priority

content.query:
VectraEntityScoring
| where ['Last Updated'] {timerange} 
| summarize arg_max(['Last Updated'],*) by ['Entity ID'], Type
| where ('*' in ({View}) or ["Is Prioritized"] in ({View})) and ('*' in ({EntityType}) or Type in ({EntityType}))
| extend ['Data Source Type'] = case(Name startswith "AWS", "AWS", 
                                        Name startswith "SAML", "AWS",
                                        Name startswith "O365", "M365/AAD",
                                        Name startswith "M365", "M365/AAD",
                                        Name startswith "Azure", "M365/AAD","Network")
| extend ['Entity Name'] = extract("^(AWS:|SAML:|O365:|M365:|Azure:)?(.*)$",2, Name)
| where ('*' in ({DataSource}) or ['Data Source Type'] in ({DataSource}))
| sort by ['Urgency Score'] desc, Importance desc
| extend Importance = case(
    Importance == 0, "Low",
    Importance == 1, "Medium",
    Importance == 2, "High",
    "Unknown"
), Velocity = case(
    Velocity == 0, "Low",
    Velocity == 1, "Medium",
    Velocity == 2, "High",
    "Unknown"
)
| project ['Urgency Score'], ['Attack Rating'], ['Entity Name'], ['Vectra Pivot'], Prioritized = ['Is Prioritized'], ['Data Source Type'], Importance, Velocity, ['Last Updated']
content.title: Entity View

content.json: üí° _Click on a row in the above Entity View grid to view more details_

content.query:
VectraEntityScoring
| where ['Last Updated'] {timerange} 
| summarize arg_max(['Last Updated'],*) by ['Entity ID'], Type
| where ('*' in ({View}) or ["Is Prioritized"] in ({View})) and ('*' in ({EntityType}) or Type in ({EntityType}))
| extend ['Data Source Type'] = case(Name startswith "AWS", "AWS", 
                                        Name startswith "SAML", "AWS",
                                        Name startswith "O365", "M365/AAD",
                                        Name startswith "M365", "M365/AAD",
                                        Name startswith "Azure", "M365/AAD","Network")
| extend ['Entity Name'] = extract("^(AWS:|SAML:|O365:|M365:|Azure:)?(.*)$",2, Name)
| where ('*' in ({DataSource}) or ['Data Source Type'] in ({DataSource})) and ['Vectra Pivot'] == '{P_deep_url}'
| project ID, ['Entity ID'], ['Data Source Type'], ['Entity Name'], Name, Importance, ['Type'], ['Is Prioritized'], Severity, ["Urgency Score"], ['Vectra Pivot'], Category, ['Last Detection URL'], ['Last Detection Type'], ["Last Detection ID"], ['Active Detection Types'], ['Last Updated'], ['Breadth Contrib'], Velocity, ['Attack Rating']
content.title: Selected Entity View data

content.query:
VectraDetections
| where ['Last Updated'] > ago(90d) and URL == '{P_deep_url}'
| summarize arg_max(['Last Updated'],*) by ['Detection ID']
| extend ['Data Source Type'] = case(['Entity UID'] startswith "AWS", "AWS", 
                                        ['Entity UID'] startswith "SAML", "AWS",
                                        ['Entity UID'] startswith "O365", "M365/AAD",
                                        ['Entity UID'] startswith "M365", "M365/AAD",
                                        ['Entity UID'] startswith "Azure", "M365/AAD","Network")
| extend ['Entity Name'] = extract("^(AWS:|SAML:|O365:|M365:|Azure:)?(.*)$",2,['Entity UID'])
| extend ['Detection Category'] = case(['Detection Category']=="botnet","Botnet",['Detection Category']=="command_and_control","Command and Control",['Detection Category']=="reconnaissance","Reconnaissance",['Detection Category']=="lateral_movement","Lateral Movement",['Detection Category']=="exfiltration","Exfiltration","Unknown")
| extend ["Detection Details"] = parse_json(["Detection Details"])[0]
| extend ["Detection Details"] = case(isnotempty(["Detection Details"]), ["Detection Details"], "Details too large to display.")
| extend ["Source IP"] = case(isnotempty(["Source IP"]), ["Source IP"], "Not Applicable")
| project ['Entity Name'], ['Detection Category'], Behavior=["Detection Name"], ['Vectra Pivot'], ['Data Source Type'],  ['Source IP'], ['Last Updated'], ["Detection Details"], ["Detection ID"]
| sort by ['Last Updated'] desc
content.title: Detection List

content.json: üí° _Click on a row in the above Detection List grid to view more details_

content.query:
VectraDetections
| where ['Last Updated'] > ago(90d) and URL == '{P_deep_url}'
| where ['Detection ID'] == '{P_detection_id}'
| extend ['Detection Category'] = case(['Detection Category']=="botnet","Botnet",['Detection Category']=="command_and_control","Command and Control",['Detection Category']=="reconnaissance","Reconnaissance",['Detection Category']=="lateral_movement","Lateral Movement",['Detection Category']=="exfiltration","Exfiltration","Unknown")
| extend ["Detection Details"] = parse_json(["Detection Details"])[0]
| extend ["Detection Details"] = case(isnotempty(["Detection Details"]), ["Detection Details"], "Details too large to display.")
| extend ["Source Host"] = parse_json(["Source Host"])[0]
| extend ["Grouped Details"] = parse_json(["Grouped Details"])[0]
| extend Summary = parse_json(Summary)[0]
| extend Details = parse_json(Details)[0]
| project ID, ['Detection Category'], ['Is Triaged'], Behavior=["Detection Name"], ["Detection ID"], ["Vectra Pivot"], ["Entity ID"], URL, ["Entity UID"], ["Last Updated"], ["Detection Details"], ["Details"], Severity, ['Source IP'], ["Normal Domains"], ["Is Targeting Key Asset"], ["Source Host"], Summary, ["Grouped Details"]
content.title: Selected Detection List Data

content.json: üìù ***Refresh the web page to fetch details of recently collected events***

parameters.name: DetectionType
parameters.label: Behavior
parameters.query:
VectraDetections
| where ['Last Updated'] {TimeRange}
| summarize arg_max(['Last Updated'],*) by ['Detection ID']
| extend source = tostring(split(['Entity UID'],":")[0])
| where ('*' in ({DataSource}) or source in ({DataSource})) and ('*' in ({DetectionCategory}) or ['Detection Category'] in ({DetectionCategory}))
| distinct ['Detection Name']
| sort by ['Detection Name'] asc

content.query:
datatable (Count:long, ['Detection Category']:string, category_count:long) [0,"Botnet",1, 0,"Command and Control",2, 0,"Reconnaissance",3, 0,"Lateral Movement",4, 0,"Exfiltration",5]
|union
(
VectraDetections
| where ['Last Updated'] {TimeRange}
| summarize arg_max(['Last Updated'],*) by ['Detection ID']
| extend ['Data Source Type'] = case(['Entity UID'] startswith "AWS", "AWS", 
                                        ['Entity UID'] startswith "SAML", "AWS",
                                        ['Entity UID'] startswith "O365", "M365/AAD",
                                        ['Entity UID'] startswith "M365", "M365/AAD",
                                        ['Entity UID'] startswith "Azure", "M365/AAD","Network")
| where ('*' in ({DataSource}) or ['Data Source Type'] in ({DataSource}))
| where ('*' in ({DetectionCategory}) or ['Detection Category'] in ({DetectionCategory})) and ('*' in ({DetectionType}) or ['Detection Name'] in ({DetectionType}))
| extend ['Detection Category'] = case(['Detection Category']=="botnet","Botnet",['Detection Category']=="command_and_control","Command and Control",['Detection Category']=="reconnaissance","Reconnaissance",['Detection Category']=="lateral_movement","Lateral Movement",['Detection Category']=="exfiltration","Exfiltration","Unknown")
| extend category_count=case(['Detection Category']=="Botnet",1,['Detection Category']=="Command and Control",2,['Detection Category']=="Reconnaissance",3,['Detection Category']=="Lateral Movement",4,['Detection Category']=="Exfiltration",5,6)
| summarize Count=count() by ['Detection Category'], category_count
)
| summarize Count=sum(Count) by ['Detection Category'], category_count
| sort by category_count asc
content.title: Detection Category Count

content.query:
VectraDetections
| where ['Last Updated']
{TimeRange}
| summarize arg_max(['Last Updated'], *) by ['Detection ID']
| extend ['Data Source Type'] = case(
                                    ['Entity UID'] startswith "AWS",
                                    "AWS", 
                                    ['Entity UID'] startswith "SAML",
                                    "AWS",
                                    ['Entity UID'] startswith "O365",
                                    "M365/AAD",
                                    ['Entity UID'] startswith "M365",
                                    "M365/AAD",
                                    ['Entity UID'] startswith "Azure",
                                    "M365/AAD",
                                    "Network"
                                )
| extend ['Entity Name'] = extract("^(AWS:|SAML:|O365:|M365:|Azure:)?(.*)$", 2, ['Entity UID'])
| where ('*' in ({DataSource}) or ['Data Source Type'] in ({DataSource}))
| where ('*' in ({DetectionCategory}) or ['Detection Category'] in ({DetectionCategory})) and ('*' in ({DetectionType}) or ['Detection Name'] in ({DetectionType}))
| extend ['Detection Category'] = case(['Detection Category'] == "botnet", "Botnet", ['Detection Category'] == "command_and_control", "Command and Control", ['Detection Category'] == "reconnaissance", "Reconnaissance", ['Detection Category'] == "lateral_movement", "Lateral Movement", ['Detection Category'] == "exfiltration", "Exfiltration", "Unknown")
| extend ["Detection Details"] = parse_json(["Detection Details"])[0]
| extend ["Detection Details"] = case(isnotempty(["Detection Details"]), ["Detection Details"], "Details too large to display.")
| extend ["Source IP"] = case(isnotempty(["Source IP"]), ["Source IP"], "Not Applicable")
| project
    ['Entity Name'],
    ['Detection Category'],
    Behavior=["Detection Name"],
    ['Vectra Pivot'],
    ['Data Source Type'],
    ['Source IP'],
    ['Last Updated'],
    ["Detection Details"],
    ["Detection ID"]
| sort by ['Last Updated'] desc
content.title: Detection View

content.json: üí° _Click on a row in the above Detection View grid to view more details_

content.query:
VectraDetections
| where ['Last Updated'] {TimeRange}
| extend ['Data Source Type'] = case(['Entity UID'] startswith "AWS", "AWS", 
                                        ['Entity UID'] startswith "SAML", "AWS",
                                        ['Entity UID'] startswith "O365", "M365/AAD",
                                        ['Entity UID'] startswith "M365", "M365/AAD",
                                        ['Entity UID'] startswith "Azure", "M365/AAD","Network")
| where ('*' in ({DataSource}) or ['Data Source Type'] in ({DataSource}))
| where ('*' in ({DetectionCategory}) or ['Detection Category'] in ({DetectionCategory})) and ('*' in ({DetectionType}) or ['Detection Name'] in ({DetectionType})) and ["Detection ID"] == '{P_detection_id}'
| extend ['Detection Category'] = case(['Detection Category']=="botnet","Botnet",['Detection Category']=="command_and_control","Command and Control",['Detection Category']=="reconnaissance","Reconnaissance",['Detection Category']=="lateral_movement","Lateral Movement",['Detection Category']=="exfiltration","Exfiltration","Unknown")
| extend ["Detection Details"] = parse_json(["Detection Details"])[0]
| extend ["Detection Details"] = case(isnotempty(["Detection Details"]), ["Detection Details"], "Details too large to display.")
| extend ["Source Host"] = parse_json(["Source Host"])[0]
| extend ["Grouped Details"] = parse_json(["Grouped Details"])[0]
| extend Summary = parse_json(Summary)[0]
| project ID, ['Detection Category'], ['Is Triaged'], Behavior=["Detection Name"], ["Detection ID"], ["Vectra Pivot"], ["Entity ID"], URL, ["Entity UID"], ["Last Updated"], ["Detection Details"], ["Details"], Severity, ['Source IP'], ["Normal Domains"], ["Is Targeting Key Asset"], ["Source Host"], Summary, ["Grouped Details"]
content.title: Selected Detection View Data

content.json: üìù ***Refresh the web page to fetch details of recently collected events***

parameters.name: EntityType
parameters.label: Entity Type
parameters.query:
VectraLockdown
| where ["Locked Date"] {TimeRange} or ["Unlock Date"] {TimeRange}
| distinct Type
| extend cap = toupper(substring(Type,0,1)), rest_string = substring(Type,1)
| extend Captilized_type = strcat(cap,rest_string)
| distinct ['Type'], Captilized_type

content.query:
VectraLockdown
| where case('{TimeRange}' contains 'ago', ["Locked Date"] {TimeRange} or (["Unlock Date"] {TimeRange} and ["Unlock Date"] <= now()), ["Locked Date"] {TimeRange} or ["Unlock Date"] {TimeRange})
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ["Entity Name"], Type, ["Locked Date"], ["Unlock Date"]
| where ('*' in ({EntityType}) or Type in ({EntityType}))
| extend current_status = case(["Locked Date"] <= now() and now() < ["Unlock Date"], "True", "False")
| where ('*' in ({EntityLocked}) or current_status in ({EntityLocked}))
| sort by ["Locked Date"] desc
| project ["Entity Name"], ["Entity Type"] = Type, ["Entity Locked"] = current_status, ["Locked By"], ["Locked Date"], ["Unlock Date"]
content.title: Lockdown View

content.json: üìù ***Refresh the web page to fetch details of recently collected events***

parameters.name: Username
parameters.query:
VectraAudits
| where ['Event Timestamp'] {TimeRange} and isnotempty(Username)
| distinct Username

content.query:
VectraAudits
| where ['Event Timestamp'] {TimeRange}
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ID
| where ('*' in ({ResultStatus}) or Status in ({ResultStatus}))
| where ('*' in ({Username}) or Username in ({Username}))
| extend Status = tolower(Status)
| extend Result_status = case(
    Status == "success", "Success",
    Status == "failure", "Failure",
    Status == "","N/A"
    ,"Unknown"
)
| extend importance = case(
    Result_status == "Success", 0,
    Result_status == "Failure", 1,
    Result_status == "NA",2
    ,3
)
| summarize count() by Result_status, importance
| sort by importance asc
content.title: Audit Logs Count

content.query:
VectraAudits
| where ['Event Timestamp'] {TimeRange}
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ID
| where ('*' in ({ResultStatus}) or Status in ({ResultStatus}))
| where ('*' in ({Username}) or Username in ({Username}))
| extend Status = case(isnotempty(Status), Status, '-')
| extend ['Event Data'] = parse_json(['Event Data'])[0]
| project-rename Role = ['User Role']
| project ['Event Timestamp'], Username, Role, Status, Message, ['Event Data']
| sort by ['Event Timestamp'] desc
content.title: Audit View

content.json: üìù ***Refresh the web page to fetch details of recently collected events***

content.query:
VectraHealth
| top 1 by TimeGenerated
| extend Network = parse_json(Network)
| extend ['Aggregated Peak Traffic (Mbps)'] = Network[0].traffic.brain.aggregated_peak_traffic_mbps
| where ("*" == '{Search}' or ['Last Updated'] contains '{Search}') or ("*" == '{Search}' or tostring(['CPU Usage - User (%)']) contains '{Search}')  or ("*" == '{Search}' or tostring(['CPU Usage - System (%)']) contains '{Search}')  or ("*" == '{Search}' or tostring(['CPU Usage - Idle (%)']) contains '{Search}')  or ("*" == '{Search}' or tostring(['Disk Utilization (%)']) contains '{Search}')  or ("*" == '{Search}' or tostring(['Memory Utilization (%)']) contains '{Search}')  or ("*" == '{Search}' or tostring(['Power Status']) contains '{Search}')  or ("*" == '{Search}' or tostring(['Power Error']) contains '{Search}')  or ("*" == '{Search}' or tostring(['Aggregated Peak Traffic (Mbps)']) contains '{Search}')
| project ['Last Updated'], ['CPU Usage - User (%)'], ['CPU Usage - System (%)'], ['CPU Usage - Idle (%)'], ['Disk Utilization (%)'], ['Memory Utilization (%)'], ['Aggregated Peak Traffic (Mbps)'], ['Power Status'], ['Power Error']
| sort by ['Last Updated'] desc
content.title: System View

content.query:
VectraHealth
| top 1 by TimeGenerated
| extend Sensors = parse_json(Sensors)
| mvapply Sensors on (project Sensors.name, Sensors.ip_address, Sensors.d_link_status, Sensors.d_aggregated_peak_traffic, Sensors.d_connectivity_status, Sensors.d_connectivity_error, Sensors.d_trafficdrop_status, Sensors.d_trafficdrop_error)
| where ("*" == '{Search}' or tostring(Sensors_name) contains '{Search}') or ("*" == '{Search}' or tostring(Sensors_ip_address) contains '{Search}')  or ("*" == '{Search}' or tostring(Sensors_d_link_status) contains '{Search}')  or ("*" == '{Search}' or tostring(Sensors_d_connectivity_status) contains '{Search}')  or ("*" == '{Search}' or tostring(Sensors_d_connectivity_error) contains '{Search}')  or ("*" == '{Search}' or tostring(Sensors_d_trafficdrop_status) contains '{Search}')  or ("*" == '{Search}' or tostring(Sensors_d_trafficdrop_error) contains '{Search}')  or ("*" == '{Search}' or tostring(Sensors_d_aggregated_peak_traffic) contains '{Search}')
| project Name = Sensors_name, ['IP Address'] = Sensors_ip_address, ['Connectivity Status'] = Sensors_d_connectivity_status, ['Connectivity Error'] = Sensors_d_connectivity_error, ['Traffic Drop Status'] = Sensors_d_trafficdrop_status, ['Traffic Drop Error'] = Sensors_d_trafficdrop_error, ['Aggregated Peak Traffic (Mbps)'] =  Sensors_d_aggregated_peak_traffic, ['Interface Link Status'] = Sensors_d_link_status
content.title: Sensors View

content.json: üìù ***Refresh the web page to fetch details of recently collected events***
